00038 class Zend_Validate_Db_RecordExists extends Zend_Validate_Db_Abstract
00039 {
00040     public function isValid($value)
00041     {
00042         $valid = true;
00043         $this->_setValue($value);
00044 
00045         $result = $this->_query($value);
00046         if (!$result) {
00047             $valid = false;
00048             $this->_error(self::ERROR_NO_RECORD_FOUND);
00049         }
00050 
00051         return $valid;
00052     }
